Description:
Alfresco living with homely warmth & perfectly located
Enjoying a peaceful location in a quiet court, this immaculate home simply sparkles with pride. It is bathed in sunshine and with glowing timber floors and ducted heating throughout, it offers entry into L-shaped lounge and dining with air conditioner and ambient electric log fire, stunning near new kitchen featuring Blanco oven and range with glass sliding doors opening to expansive covered north facing timber deck, ideal for year round entertaining. The comfortable interior also offers 3 beautifully bright robed bedrooms, pristine bathroom with bath and shower, separate WC and laundry with external access. Additionally, a powered bungalow/studio, garage/workshop, garden shed, abundant storage and plenty of off street parking ensures family friendly criteria in this excellent location close to public transport, schools, shops, Monash Medical and University.
Ryan Counihan : 0402 188 519
Insights: 9 Caringal Court, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
OCCUPY OR INVEST CENTRAL TO LIFESTYLE CONVENIENCES
SALE BY FIXED DATE: Offers by Monday 23rd May at 5pm.
A fusion of style, quality and space are the brilliant hallmarks of this executive streetfront townhouse presenting enticing first home buyer or investor credentials. Impeccably presented, a smart open plan design incorporates a spacious family/living/meals zone with a premium stone-topped kitchen that effortlessly connects to an outdoor entertaining courtyard. 4 robed bedrooms (main with walk-in robe ensuite) and 3 bathrooms complement an impressive sense of space, whilst a study/5th bedroom, ducted heating/cooling, water tank and single garage add appealing advantages. Positioned in an area known for its substantial growth, moments to Westall station, Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University. Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Vendor Must Sell!
Not everyone wants a big backyard that will take up their weekends, or a renovator's delight that will drain their time and money. Some people smart people just want a perfectly packaged home that's big on character and low on upkeep like this excellent two bedroom plus study/Children bedroom in Clayton South!
Neat and tidy, it has everything you want and needs a minimum of fuss. All three bedrooms are big, bright and fitted with built-in robes. The modern family bathroom features a bath, shower and laundry provisions, while a contemporary kitchen is sure to please with its maximum (and intelligent) use of space, ample storage and stainless steel appliances.
Open-plan living with floating timber floors underfoot offers a warm and welcoming heart to the home, while split-system heating and cooling, an easy-care courtyard and single carport adds further appeal.
Located within walking distance of Westall train station and close to Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, parks, local schools and Clarinda Shopping Centre, it's ideal for first-time buyers, investors or downsizers looking to cut back the clutter.

Description:
Boutique, Stylish And Sophisticated
Nest or Invest with this apartment that features 2 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, master with large ensuite and additional bathroom, kitchen fitted with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. Modern designed bathroom, spacious balcony, reverse cycle split system air conditioning, centrally located security intercom, secure car parking, storage locker and much more. This low maintenance, 5 star energy efficient apartment features quality fixtures and fittings designed by award winning Tract Landscape architects.
A perfect opportunity arises for you to take that first step to owning your own home or to add to your investment portfolio (currently getting a good return).
Within walking distance to Westall Train Station, close to schools, Springvale Homemaker Centre, Chadstone shopping centre, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!
ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
STYLISH & CHIC TRIPLE STOREY LIVING!
This stunning example of stylish living combined with low maintenance is a property not to be missed out.
Featuring a triple storey 3 bedroom with BIR residence, comprising of 2 modern bathrooms tiled to the ceiling. The open plan living/kitchen area is finished with warm timber floorboards, abundant natural light, quality gas stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 2 split system air conditioners.
The storage cage with secure basement car parking with remote controlled gates shows that this excellent property demands your attention. Front landscaped courtyard as well as private viewing balcony completes the pretty picture.
Situated within walking distance to Keeley Park, Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, Clayton Shopping District and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, local schools and parklands, what more could you ask for? Call today

Description:
Convenient Modern Living
Situated within walking distance to Clayton Train station and Clayton shops, and only minutes from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre, this apartment features two ample-sized bedrooms with built in robes, main with en-suite.
Other features include air conditioning and heating, down lights throughout, modern kitchen with stainless steel oven, rangehood and cooktop, beautiful glass splashback, Ceaser stone benchtops, dishwasher, floating floor boards, carpeted bedrooms, European laundry, balcony, secure underground car parking plus lockable storage and secure video intercom entry.
This well designed modern living apartment will appeal to both first home buyers and investors alike, currently tenanted at $1,608 pcm.

Description:
Charming and Characteristic
A quiet and secluded court perfectly positioned in a family oriented locale.
Be greeted by a perfectly manicured lawn as this charming brick home has all the features and warmth that you'd want for your family. Come inside and be surprised by the spaciousness of this stunning 3 Bed 2 Bath home showcasing a perfect blend of modern comforts and conveniences.
All bedrooms feature BIR with Master with ensuite. With 2 living areas and an expertly planned fully renovated kitchen overlooking the dining area, its efficiency and easy care ensures you will enjoy the very best of lifestyle options without the compromise. From the main lounge area, step out onto your private covered alfresco and entertainment area to maximise enjoyment of peace and tranquillity. Other excellent features include a dual lockup carport with enough room for a workshop in the back and a large garden shed for that extra little storage you need.
Cleverly positioned, it will give you the feeling of seclusion however is only just minutes away from main amenities such as Westall train station, and close to Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, parks, local schools and Clarinda Shopping Centre. Terms 10% Deposit Balance 30/45 days.
PHOT ID REQUIRED FOR ENTRY

Description:
LIVE MORE, WORK LESS IN THIS PREMIER ENTERTAINER
Catering to the live more, work less lifestyle we all crave, this superbly spacious, corner residence, effortlessly blends spectacular indoor and outdoor entertaining with low-maintenance lifestyle appeal. Highlighted by glamorous high ceilings, the stylish formal lounge and dining room flows through to an adjoining open plan kitchen, meals and family room, showcasing stone benches, Fisher & Paykel appliances plus a generous breakfast bench. Magnificent, glass sliding doors create a seamless indoor/outdoor connection, extending out on two sides to the covered, alfresco entertaining zone and sunny, paved courtyard. Complemented by a downstairs laundry and separate toilet for convenience. Reserved for sleeping, the upper level offers three robed bedrooms, master with mirrored built-in-robes and ensuite, supplemented by a family bathroom with toilet. In addition, quality extras include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, water tank, satellite for international TV, under stair storage plus a large double garage. All this and in a terrific location, only a hop, skip and a jump to Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College plus Westall Primary, nearby Ikea, Monash Uni, Monash Medical Centre plus Monash and EastLink Freeway access.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Endless Possibilities on a Huge Corner Block!
Rare properties like this don't come on the market very often, as this one has had only one owner for over 50 years.
We are calling all developers to secure this magnificent development site before it is too late.
This fantastic multi dwelling corner block located on the corner of Haughton Road and Bevan Avenue represents endless possibilities. Existing large double storey home comprises 5 bedrooms, 2 bath, 3 living areas, 3 car garage and much more, but its all about the size of the land and location. Conveniently positioned within close proximity to Clayton shops, train station, Monash Hospital, Monash University, local schools and parks, this property could be the next multi-townhouse project for you.
For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357.

Description:
BIGGER THAN MOST - MUST SELL!
Boasting a total area of approx. 114m2 this modern ground floor apartment is only minutes walk from Westall train station, nearby shops and schools. Springvale Homemaker Centre, Clayton and Springvale shopping precincts, the Monash Medical Centre and Monash University are all within reach.
Main features: 2 spacious bedrooms (ensuite and study nook in master bedroom) with built-in-robes; brightly lit open plan living/dining; fully appointed kitchen with S/S gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and stone bench tops. The second bathroom has a space saving European laundry. Additional luxuries include reverse cycle air-conditioning, security intercom, basement car parking, storage cage and ample visitors parking
call JAMES TAN 0450-351-706

Description:
A PRIVATE, COMFORTABLE & IMPRESSIVE LOW MAINTENANCE HOME
At the rear of a compact block in a quiet court, this beautiful unit offers the ultimate in private living that will please both investors and home buyers seeking a low maintenance lifestyle. Fronted by a timeless rendered facade, you step inside and find a light filled home in great condition that features a generous living and dining area with tiles underfoot as well as a beautiful kitchen with stainless steel oven and gas cook top. There are 2 large bedrooms with big built in wardrobes as well as a pristine bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry. Ducted heating and an air conditioner provide additional comfort and outside there's a single garage with internal access and a grass free courtyard to keep maintenance to a minimum. A great location completes the picture with buses, Clayton South Primary School as well as central Clayton's shops and train station all just minutes away.
Insights: 5/24-26 Newport Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Builders Own Home & Dual Occ Potential in Clayton Central!!
Potential, Position and Price, is what makes this home a standout buy! Many possibilities awaits the lucky buyer, offering a home that is ready to move in or opportunities to add further value. You can choose to extend or renovate on an already accommodating floorplan or keep the front and build another unit in the back (STCA).
Whether you are looking for a home that is ready to move in, an investment or your next small project. This home is it.....Positioned Centrally within minutes' walk to Clayton Central, Monash Aquatic Centre/Library, Clayton Station, Namitjira Park and short drive to Morrabbin Costco/DFO and Chadstone Shopping Centre. Everything is so conveniently located....... you might as well put away the car.
SPECIAL FEATURES
Solid Home in great Condition
4 Bedrooms
Polished Floorboards
Ducted Heating/3 Split Systems
Dual Occupancy Potential (STCA)
708m2 (15.17 X 46.5) Land Size
Easy Access to Public Transport (Bus or Train)
Clayton Central Locale!!!!!!!

Description:
Corner Block! - Own Street Frontage - Own Driveway!
Poised to set fresh standards of quality and comfort, this striking architect-designed town-residence will offer sensational style in a highly desirable location, representing an outstanding opportunity to first home buyers, young families and investors. To be constructed by a leading Clayton builder, Big bedrooms (each bedroom with its private ensuite), 3 Separate living areas, own driveways, no common land & luxuriously appointed floor plan will have the best of contemporary thinking throughout. Tasmanian Oak floorboards will flow through generous open-plan layouts featuring high-calibre kitchens with European appliances and stone benchtops (40mm), stylish bathrooms elegantly low-maintenance north facing rear gardens for maximum natural sun light. Providing added convenience these comprehensively equipped homes will feature heating/cooling, window blinds, remote access garages, high quality insulation throughout and 7 year builder warranty.
For more information Contact Moses Sawiris to arrange a viewing in Buxton's Display Suite.

Description:
Comfortable Living in an Enviable Location!
This perfectly located unit is ripe for astute investors or first home buyers. Location is key for this property being just a short 150 meters walk to the Westall Train Station, access to the Rosebank Avenue shopping strip just 400 meters away and both the Westall Primary School and Westall Secondary College at the end of the street only 250 meters away! The unit itself enjoys a sun drenched north facing entrance that opens into the carpeted flexible living area which flows through to the two generous bedrooms with BIR and open kitchen and meals area. These are services by the spacious central bathroom. Move straight in or with scope for further improvement, this home is not expected to last long!
Contact today to organise your private inspection.

Description:
Owner Says Sell!!
This 2 bedroom apartment, close to train station will impress the most discerning of buyers. With quality carpets, fixtures and fittings, this home is approx 3 years old and boasts; 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, large living, dining, tiles to all wet areas, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. The contemporary bathroom is a real WOW, with a European style laundry included and a huge balcony for those warm balmy nights to relax on. Other features include: air conditioning, heating and undercover car space on title. Within walking distance to Westall Train Station, schools, Springvale Homemaker Centre, shops, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University. With high rental returns achievable and in such a convenient location, this is surely an opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 326/59 Autumn Terrace, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction this Saturday at 10.30am
Flexible floorplan with appeal for families and investors
Freestanding with its own street frontage, landscaped front garden and private alfresco entertaining area, this elegant and as-new townhouse in a wide and very tranquil street is within easy walking distance to Westall Station, Clayton Station and village, buses to Monash University or Box Hill, IKEA shopping centre, a choice of parkland including Keeley Park, as well as child care centres, kinders and schools.
Close proximity to large employment centres, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre widens the appeal of this well-appointed and low-maintenance home to include astute investors.
Featuring a choice of formal and informal living areas, a well-appointed, open plan kitchen with Blanco appliances, generous stone benchtops, a very spacious central dining area, a flexible, flow-through floorplan leading to a sunny, private courtyard with a timber deck and vegetable patch.
Comprising generous and flexible accommodation with a ground floor study or 4th bedroom, 3 spacious upstairs bedrooms with robes, the main with a stone ensuite and split system cooling and a large family bathroom with a separate bath.
Quality appointments include a single auto garage with direct access, fitted laundry with external access, guest powder room, evaporative cooling, floating timber floors, plush carpets, generous storage, water tank, privacy blinds and wide-slat venetians.
Low-maintenance living in a private and peaceful setting with exciting appeal for families and investors.
* Wide, quiet street with local traffic only moments from shops, schools and parks
* Walk to Westall Station, short drive to Monash Uni or Monash Medical Centre and IKEA
* As-new with quality appointments throughout
* Freestanding with its own street frontage to Bevan Avenue
* Flexible accommodation of up to 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms
* Formal and informal living options and a private rear courtyard
Insights: 1/30 Bevan Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT - ANOTHER URGENTLY WANTED BY BUYERS WHO MISSED OUT
It's always a pleasure to find a home like this that has been built, owned and loved by just one family and its condition reflects a lifetime of care. On a corner block of around 600sqm, the home offers its new owner the possibility of renting it out in its current condition, renovating or extending your new home or starting from scratch and developing either a luxurious new family home or 2 sizeable townhouses that are always in high demand in this area (all building options are STCA). Perfectly presented, the home features an updated and appealing brick facade with a covered front patio and inside is light and airy with big windows, light tones and polished hardwood floors throughout. The generous lounge has a gas heater and is complemented by a dining room and a large kitchen with electric oven stove and room for a casual eating area. There are 3 bedrooms including 1 with built in wardrobes plus a family bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry. Outside there are neat and easily maintained gardens and the bonus of a double garage. No matter what you choose to do, the location is great with buses, trains, Monash University and central Clayton all set just minutes away.
Insights: 36 Bevan Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless Classic
This 4 bedroom 2 bath Post War classic weatherboard home retains a sense of history and blends old world elegance with modern convenience showcasing internal spaces rich in textures and views. Multiple living zones maximise the comfort of the whole family. The master suite has a look and feel of a vacation hideaway with a welcoming feel that conveniently detaches from the family hustle and bustle.
A large fireplace (currently fitted with gas heater) centres the living room, and a vast bank of windows provide expansive views of the front verandah and garden. The central hallway feeds off to 3 bedrooms, central bathroom and the kitchen family area that stays clutter-free thanks to plentiful drawers and cabinets. Stay engaged in food preparation and socialising with a mix of warm colours and textures that make this kitchen feel comfortable and cosy. Rich cork tiles echo the luxuriant greens of the garden's expansive plantings. A covered verandah provides comfortably shaded outdoor space and offers the ideal spot for outdoor dining.
The home sits on a large, meticulously maintained parcel that offers a private rear garden and the workshop-garage boasts electronically controlled doors comfortably accommodating large vehicles. Solar panels provide all year round electricity that will cut your energy costs down to the pennies and bore water will do the same.
A tranquil street, close to parks, schools transport and shops.
Insights: 21 Helena St, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.
